channel.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?

item.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:5, topic:495304”][quote author=Sup22211 link=topic=613535.msg4239203#msg4239203 date=1361733102]
on you killing method you would want to add this:
String killer = “You have been slain”+playerName;
sendMessage(" “+killer+” ");
[/quote]

Why are you creating another string object? This would be a much simpler method:

sendMessage("You have slain " + playerName + ".");[/quote]was about to say that,
OT: you’ve been given 2 answers

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add Pking shout outs?

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

then c2.sendMessage(“string”);

item.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

i think he means send the message to all users online, not just the player killed.

if this is the case then you’ll have to use a for-loop to loop through all players online then send the message.
if not just use the sendMessage("…"); method.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add Pking shout outs?

item.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Dont think i use this ways, i use it normally i just showed him the thing in java that called “STRING”;
Anyways, we should show him now what is a string then he would search all night : Google: “WHAT IS STRING IN JAVA!!!”?
Lol. :eek:

item.source: How do I add Pking shout outs?

item.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Sup22211:

“Bad programmer” ? i just showed him how to use a string lol.

I didn’t say bad programmer… I said bad practices.
This is a bad practice (and should be avoided because of the unnecessary objects):

String killer = "You have been slain by " + playerName; sendMessage(" "+killer+" ");

These are good practices:

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:7, topic:495304”]i dont know, if you dont have one add one or search one.

on you killing method you would want to add this:
String killer = “You have been slain”+playerName;
sendMessage(" “+killer+” ");

Why are you creating another string object? This would be a much simpler method:

that not reallly matther because he is just a basic programmer so you know i thought i could help him learn something new.[/quote]
If he is a basic programmer then there is even more reason to avoid bad practices. An experienced programmer will know that there is no need to create another String object (“killer”), but a basic programmer will not and may pick up the bad practices.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add Pking shout outs?
item.dc:creator: @wrathy wrathy
item.description:
@wrathy wrote:

Hey Mopar;

I have a Pking server, but I was wondering how to add something like this to my server;

“Adam has Slain Jake”

Or something similar so it shows the whole server in the chat that Adam has slain Jake

Thanks.
